summary: REQ-4 (gentle fade-in on the romantic hero image, preserving float and honoring reduced-motion) appears to be implemented via new/updated animation styles in global CSS and corresponding usage in App. However, the diff also introduces/changes theme-related behavior (forcing a romantic theme) that was not requested by REQ-4.

hallucinated_features.description: Forcing the entire app into a 'romantic' theme via a data-theme attribute on document root (theme switching behavior)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a gentle fade-in animation on the hero image; it does not request changing/forcing global theming.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition/expansion of multiple theme presets (e.g., 'romantic' and 'playful') in global CSS variables
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the requested hero-image fade-in animation requirement; this is broader theming work beyond REQ-4.
